*[Bug 18955] cairo library update 1.16 -> 1.18 seems to break font embedding into PDF (R 4.3 -> 4.4 transition)*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18955>

--- Comment #8 from Kristian Vlahovicek (<mailto:kristian@bioinfo.hr|kristian@bioinfo.hr>) ---
Thank you Paul!

I have re-tested the Linux version(s) and I confirm there are no problems with
embedding with libcairo 1.18.4 (my original observation about having the same
issues with Linux may have indeed been based on the incorrectly installed
font):

```
Rtest$ R --version
R version 4.5.1 (2025-06-13) -- "Great Square Root"
```

```
Rtest$ pdfinfo "Font embedding test - Ubuntu Condensed in 4.5.1 Great Square
Root x86_64.pdf"
Producer:        cairo 1.18.4 (<https://cairographics.org>)
CreationDate:    Mon Oct 13 12:26:04 2025 CEST
Custom Metadata: no
Metadata Stream: no
Tagged:          no
UserProperties:  no
Suspects:        no
Form:            none
JavaScript:      no
Pages:           1
Encrypted:       no
Page size:       864 x 576 pts
Page rot:        0
File size:       10057 bytes
Optimized:       no
PDF version:     1.7
```

```
Rtest$ pdffonts "Font embedding test - Ubuntu Condensed in 4.5.1 Great Square
Root x86_64.pdf"
name                                 type              encoding         emb sub
uni object ID
------------------------------------ ----------------- ---------------- --- ---
--- ---------
KAYPXQ+UbuntuCondensed-Regular       TrueType          WinAnsi          yes yes
yes      7  0
```


The **Windows-generated files** (still) have a problem as described (and
attached):

```
Rtest$ pdfinfo "Font embedding test - Ubuntu Condensed in 4.3.3 Angel Food Cake
x86_64 libcairo 1.16 Windows.pdf"
Producer:        cairo 1.16.0 (<https://cairographics.org>)
CreationDate:    Mon Sep 29 15:40:31 2025 CEST
Custom Metadata: no
Metadata Stream: no
Tagged:          no
UserProperties:  no
Suspects:        no
Form:            none
JavaScript:      no
Pages:           1
Encrypted:       no
Page size:       864 x 576 pts
Page rot:        0
File size:       9799 bytes
Optimized:       no
PDF version:     1.5
```

```
Rtest$ pdffonts "Font embedding test - Ubuntu Condensed in 4.3.3 Angel Food
Cake x86_64 libcairo 1.16 Windows.pdf"
name                                 type              encoding         emb sub
uni object ID
------------------------------------ ----------------- ---------------- --- ---
--- ---------
MKGYJI+UbuntuCondensed-Regular       TrueType          WinAnsi          yes yes
yes      6  0

```

```
Rtest$ pdfinfo "Font embedding test - Ubuntu Condensed in 4.5.0 How About a
Twenty-Six x86_64 Windows.pdf"
Producer:        cairo 1.18.2 (<https://cairographics.org>)
CreationDate:    Tue Oct  7 18:52:42 2025 CEST
Custom Metadata: no
Metadata Stream: no
Tagged:          no
UserProperties:  no
Suspects:        no
Form:            none
JavaScript:      no
Pages:           1
Encrypted:       no
Page size:       864 x 576 pts
Page rot:        0
File size:       22847 bytes
Optimized:       no
PDF version:     1.7
```

```
Rtest$ pdffonts "Font embedding test - Ubuntu Condensed in 4.5.0 How About a
Twenty-Six x86_64 Windows.pdf"
name                                 type              encoding         emb sub
uni object ID
------------------------------------ ----------------- ---------------- --- ---
--- ---------
YKGHTD+ArialMT                       TrueType          WinAnsi          yes yes
yes      7  0
```
